title: Need someone to extract data from 19 surveys made with Google Forms and convert to a Word Doc
snippet:
Hi, I recently did 19 on-line surveys through Google Forms as part of a research project. Unfortunately the export function on Google Forms is crap and only allows me to save the results as PDFs. I need someone to go through each the PDF results of each survey, extract the questions and answers, and convert each one into a nice, clean looking Word document. For an example of one survey result please see the PDF attached. 

I need this done as quickly as possible - ideally one day, two days maximum.
